full_summary:
# Project Support Organization for Delivery of a Support Services Contract

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Contractor to provide a project support organization capable of delivering administrative, planning, and support services for the delivery of a Support Services Contract at the Campus St-Jean site.

### Background

The Contract will require a qualified Contractor to assist in the procurement and implementation of Support Services Contract, including business planning, project management, and related services. This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified under Tier 2 (more than $3.75 M) and under the stated consultant category.

### Requirements

The Contractor must provide a team of skilled professionals with expertise in the following areas:

- Business Consulting/Change Management
- Project Management Services
- Real Property Project Management Services Class

Specifically, the Contractor must demonstrate:

- A strong track record in business planning, project management, and related services
- Expertise in the areas of business consulting, change management, and risk management
- Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment
- Strong communication and stakeholder engagement skills

### Eligibility Criteria

Only Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified under Tier 2 (more than $3.75 M) and under the stated consultant category are eligible to respond to this RFP.

### Invitation to Proposal

A list of invited Suppliers is provided below:

- 9468269 Canada Corp.
- Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
- Alivaktuk Consulting Inc. & NavPoint Consulting Group Inc. in JV
- ...

### Key Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-05-11T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-06-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-03-31

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Daven Ho, Daven.ho@forces.gc.ca, (613) 862-6689

### Additional Information

Please refer to the attached RFP document [1] for detailed information regarding the requirement. The RFP document can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca.
